english.segment1: Surrender, a word that we don't understand. How are we to get ahead when we have empty hands?. We fight for what will fade. We cling to that from which we're saved. And soon we'll wake to find. We've naught but fists of sand. What good is the whole world. If you've no soul? (Mark 8:36)
english.segment2: Cast your bread upon the water's edge. And you will find the bread of Life (John 6:35). Cast your bread
english.segment3: Our bread seems small but when it's broken it will feed. A multitude of thousands, hungry and in need (Mark 6:30-44). If we want to live. Our life is something we must give (Mark 8:35). Just like kernels of wheat. die to bare forth seeds (John 12:24). Lord it's in your hands now. As it's always been
